c6e6deb1-b7e1-42e3-b86e-6f157344ea72: Dismantling Attack also cripples the enemy, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by −30 until the end of combat.
287cb2fd-eace-4d62-94be-2aaba035a8de: Dismantling Attack also intimidates all enemies in a 5-cell radius around the target, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −15% until the end of combat.
1f6909c4-60be-48c7-9431-e1872a2b34de: Perfect Spot additionally grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} +{uip|ArmourPenetration|5bd4a497a8e643ad8049edbd4fab77e0}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} against enemies that are 7 cells away or farther.
94e06216-60e0-40ec-bbba-b214cfbf1182: Tactical Knowledge requires 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} instead of 4. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus}.
682b17a3-5c03-44cf-999e-9d8bc98223ca:
An {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} to find and {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} weaknesses in an enemy's defences. None can withstand an attack from an Operative.
Core focus: precise single attacks, defence penetration, area debuffs, consistent firing position.
896e9f47-e845-4f22-9d81-30d415732d24: At the start of each enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, if that enemy is affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g}, they inflict +1 exploit on a random enemy not affected by exploits in a 3-cell radius.
306f19eb-28f4-40b1-97af-ea847f66fdb0:
At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} effect on all enemies in the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}.
If the Operative {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with an exploit stack, the attack deals +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The damage is also increased by 10% for each exploit on the target. The attack removes all exploits from the target.
a5b28dd7-93e6-4447-be67-7e5dc068c065: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the enemy with the largest number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} receives an additional exploit stack. If two or more enemies are tied for the largest number of exploit stacks, one of those enemies is chosen at random.
40d2c119-9ce1-4b08-b928-94269b90aa80: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy for every two of the Operative's allies who have the enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This can trigger on multiple enemies.
ca1a1af8-1d1b-4eef-892b-8d92b0a89d41: For the next attack against a target affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g}, that target's {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} will be reduced by −<u>(5 + {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} × stacks of exploit)</u>%. This attack will have +<u>(5 + {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} × stacks of exploit)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.
dc7adb44-57ee-46a5-8db9-f4a69ac7aa51: If Intimidation kills the target, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all other enemies in the area of Intimidation is reduced by an additional −{uip|DamagePenalty|dde11f867df84e61a67c2a444fe87a68}%.
b3653ca6-4344-436a-ac27-14e575b890d2: If an enemy affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} within 5 cells from the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks the Operative or their ally, that enemy suffers +1 additional exploit.
51fab033-018b-4212-9b58-3a64e137551e: If the target of Analyse Enemies has 2 or more {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g}, that target suffers +1 additional exploit.
2b047824-ffc7-423c-888f-dd9f14111799: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks a target affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} from a distance of {uip|Range|070ab229e0cb4e88b564e7428e350d03} cells or farther, that attack deals +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
4670a313-ac58-4c74-a789-b4249ff00ece: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} has not moved this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every 5 cells between them and the target.
8b2f0482-3334-4def-aa1e-5481b2cbc314: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}half cover{/g}, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} or until they move.
de578abd-c1e5-42da-b022-e431e335a598: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses Precise Attack on a target affected by {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} or more {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, that hit becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
5181bb6a-f7e8-4866-aa8d-2bd9dcf62fb6: On their first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} randomly distributes the same number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} as when using Analyse Enemies among all enemies in a 10-cell radius around the Operative. At the start of each of the Operative's subsequent turns, they distribute half as many exploits (half the base amount) among all enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Operative.
74f01b56-9d54-4684-a2bd-da0062e12f71: The target also provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} whenever it attacks.
945ac069-a2c8-4a34-9b8f-2e82d52edd6a:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} immediately inflicts 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on all enemies in combat, then makes a free attack against a target. That attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>
c6540399-6208-4040-b0e3-b5b83d91ba1d:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} immediately inflicts 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on all enemies in combat, then makes a free attack against a target. That attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
43ab4851-d540-43eb-b72d-49d1df84a3f8: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} even on enemies which are out of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
a6b9621a-5d74-43d9-9b6e-5d3402b6550b: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} from the target to decrease the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −<u>(10 + exploits stacks × {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus})</u>% until the start of the Operative's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
e2921f84-b672-427f-95e9-d0acf6d9bbf2: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} suffers −{uip|DamageReduction|4c56ec5c399f4c70815dd5596b0e7b83}% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from enemies affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g}.
651f40ee-ed3f-4d2a-9c5b-6442666e385b: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} targets one enemy within 10 cells from the Operative. That target immediately gains +{uip|Exploits|502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c} {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g}.
6e03a290-0fd3-4b70-ad1c-a08e3ae347af: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s allies gain +{uip|HitChanceBonus|832dd8b02731461a881775696d937d71}% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} while attacking targets affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g}.
5e9f65a6-8016-4d97-bcc9-4f594464dcbb: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot move, and the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −3.
e2c9d44f-e79d-4979-888b-21522ab0a7ad: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks an enemy that is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, that attack deals +{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that enemy.
d9fe0ee9-f347-417a-9bdc-380fb74c9318: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.
1973b25f-e5c3-4428-a497-510eea0ccb7f:
While in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} gains +25% cover efficiency, +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.
This effect lasts until the Operative moves. Does not stack.
ed8d2dc0-3b8b-4ac6-b668-6178fb5e9070: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}half cover{/g}, Analyse Enemies costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} instead of 2.
a13c06f0-e420-4654-bf76-8ba4f796cca8: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}half cover{/g}, their cover efficiency is increased by +15%. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled if the Operative has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
3269e346-5c49-4e64-b9a9-7b6033a7d11a: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is 10 or higher, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
